title: Looking for dedicated complete try hard ADC (Plat+) season 6
body:
(Before reading this please know how to last hit minions) << If this is a go continue reading.

Hello  so i have decided to main Support ({{champion:16}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} ) this season and the next my goal: Diamond! =D
>>Please add me if you meet these requirements<<
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---Personality----                                                                                                     
-Someone that can always see the positive                                                   
-Good to talk with                                                                                                
-In general just a nice person                                                                             
---Communication--- 
-TeamSpeak3
-Skype
-Discord/Curse
Any of these will do
---Last of all---
-Someone that is 100% focused on achieving a goal of them self
-willing to improve and learn from mistakes 
-Flexible 
-Plat 5+ or gold 1 the lowest
Has a lot of experience already with ADC
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for taking the time to read =D

replies.body:
i have a mate who is good at adc was plat 5 last season but could of done of better given a good support he plays twitch add me or him if u wanna hit him up 

His name is G00b

thats g-zero-zero-b

best of luck with ur goal of diamond 

Kind Regards 

Boone{{item:3812}}

Versed this guy in lane once. He was very good.
Good Luck for diamond :)
Kind Regards 
Bingi{{item:3104}}

yo i have plenty of experience in the ADC role, finished season 6 in Plat 5 but got to Plat 3 in preseason and was D4 at my highest, most importantly im friendly, like to joke while also playing seriously.

P.S: i can last hit minions
